meanings.definition: A type of antelope found in southern Africa.
meanings.sent1: The bontboks grazed peacefully in the grasslands.
meanings.sent2: We saw a herd of bontboks while on safari.
meanings.sent3: The bontboks decided to have a race with the zebras for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was as swift and graceful as a bontboks in the savanna.
meanings.sent5: The bontboks' distinctive white face made it easy to spot among the trees.
